installCommand: echo '=== BEFORE INSTALL ===' && pwd && ../../debug-pnpm.sh && echo '=== INSTALLING ===' && pnpm install -w --filter web... && echo '=== AFTER INSTALL ===' && ../../debug-pnpm.sh
buildCommand: echo '=== BEFORE BUILD ===' && ../../debug-pnpm.sh && echo '=== BUILDING ===' && pnpm build && echo '=== AFTER BUILD ===' && ../../debug-pnpm.sh
